pageContext.claim: “MS-13 takes advantage of glaring loopholes in our immigration laws to infiltrate our country. That's what they do. Think of it. We're bringing them out by the thousands, but they come in. We're bringing them out by the thousands.”
pageContext.analysis: What Trump describes as "glaring loopholes" in the law also could be described as the legal framework for refugees, asylum-seekers and children fleeing violence in their home countries. MS-13 and other criminal organizations do try to exploit these laws. But that doesn't mean that only violent gangs are trying to avail themselves of these processes. Also, Trump's administration has been deporting or imprisoning hundreds, not thousands, of MS-13 members.
